org.apache.tools.ant
Class ProjectHelper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectHelper
public class ProjectHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Configures a Project (complete with Targets and Tasks) based on a XML build file.

Author:
duncan@x180.com
